name: Inferno (itch) (mauisland)
description: I watched the Inferno movie, based on the Dan Brown's novel. But I watched half of it, thinking the on-demand service of my cable-tv-provider would keep the movie, but I was wrong and they erased it. So the game is the movie, for the first half, the second half is a work of my imagination. I later could finish the movie, and it turned out totally different than what I imagined here.
